attributes.action: Hold off letting children go back to school till September or when fully safe.
attributes.additional_details: The government should hold off opening schools till it is absolutely safe to do so and it should be a parents choice whether they wish to sign their child back into the education system or not during the lockdown, it should not be compulsory due to the fact education services and providers will be limited in their capabilities.
attributes.background: There are many schools wanting to open in June. However, the restrictions and safety measures mean classes would be restricted to potentially 30% of class sizes if not less, children attending schools on different days, children not being able to share toys and equipment which will affect learning.
